Header: More cocaine retrieved from arrested Brazilians (Photos)
Content: 163 cocaine capsules have so far been retrieved from the two Brazil nationals who were apprehended at the Bandaranaike International Airport following a tip-off. The total weight was 1.950 kg and the estimated value is Rs. 48.5 million. The two Brazilians were arrested by a combined effort carried out by the Police Narcotics Bureau and Sri Lanka Customs based on intelligence gathering. The suspects aged 30 and 24 were apprehended on 30th of June and yesterday. Now they are warded at Negombo Hospital under police protection.
